tag_list: angel-invested, seed-captial, venture-capital, mobile-technology, advertising, data-technology, ventures, startups
overview:
Mr. Sebastian Lombardo is an Investment Banker and currently serves as Managing Partner of High Point Collaboration. Mr. Lombardo specializes in developing unique investment models to raise capital for businesses. Mr. Lombardo has been instrumental in the development numerous businesses with early-stage and mid-stage funding in excess of over $800 million.

Prior to receiving his MBA in 2003, Mr. Lombardo was a revolutionary pioneer within the new media advertising sector. By combining low cost, new media advertising placements with financial based arbitrage opportunities, Mr. Lombardo was single handily responsible in generating over $100 million in returns for investors within years.

Mr. Lombardo is fluent in English and Japanese and enjoys relaxing with a glass of scotch while researching new opportunities.
